abstract: NFL Roundup; Cleveland Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel will start in upcoming game against Tennessee Titans, while Josh McCown recovers from concussion; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: McCown was injured on Cleveland’s opening drive last week against the Jets and has not been cleared to practice by an independent neurologist.

headline.main: With Josh McCown Hurt, Johnny Manziel Is the Browns Starter
headline.print_headline: With McCown Hurt, Manziel Is the Starter

snippet: McCown was injured on Cleveland’s opening drive last week against the Jets and has not been cleared to practice by an independent neurologist.
